<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120363</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120363</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Vzbujeno nihanje in resonanca</string>
            <string language="en">Driven Motion and Resonance</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Angetriebene Bewegung und Resonanz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mouvement et résonance pilotés</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento e resonance dirigidos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Movimento e risonanza guidati</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οδηγημένες κίνηση και αντήχηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento y resonancia conducidos</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Nihalo iz mirovne lege zbujamo tako da se ustvari resonanca.</string>
            <string language="en">The pendulum is driven from its equilibrium state in such a way that resonance occurs.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">nihanje</string>
            <string language="en">oscillation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">resonanca</string>
            <string language="en">resonance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">periodično gibanje</string>
            <string language="en">periodic motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Pendel wird von seinem Gleichgewichtzustand 
angetrieben, so daß Resonanz auftritt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le pendule est piloté par son état d'équilibre
de telle manière que la résonance se produise.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O pêndulo é dirigido de seu estado do 
equilíbrio de tal maneira que o resonance ocorre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il pendolo è guidato dal relativo equilibrio 
dichiara im modo tale che la risonanza accade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το εκκρεμές οδηγείται από το κράτος ισορροπίας του 
κατά τέτοιο τρόπο ώστε η αντήχηση εμφανίζεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El péndulo se conduce de su estado del 
equilibrio de una manera tal que ocurra la resonancia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pendelbewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Resonanz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">periodische Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">oscillation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">résonance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement périodique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">oscilação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">resonance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento periódico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">oscillazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">risonanza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento periodico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ταλάντωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντήχηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιοδική κίνηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">oscilación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">resonancia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">movimiento periódico</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
